column4: BRIEF-NACCO Industries Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.18 From Continuing Operations
column6: * NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
column7: * IN 2018, NACCO EXPECTS CONSOLIDATED INCOME BEFORE INCOME TAX FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO DECREASE MODESTLY COMPARED WITH 2017
column8: * INCOME FROM UNCONSOLIDATED OPERATIONS IS EXPECTED TO BE MODESTLY HIGHER IN 2018
column9: * CASH FLOW BEFORE FINANCING ACTIVITIES IS EXPECTED TO DECREASE SUBSTANTIALLY IN 2018 COMPARED WITH 2017
column10: * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE UP TO $32 MILLION IN 2018
column11: * NACCO INDUSTRIES-MISSISSIPPI POWER’S DECISION TO CLOSE MINE ON FEB 8 UNFAVORABLY AFFECTS NORTH AMERICAN COAL’S LONG-TERM EARNINGS POTENTIAL FROM MINE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
